author: henning
msg: Add a new Tool Type: RunDataApplicationTool. This is for e.g. global or
session tools, which still need access to a current RunData object. Tools
implementing this interface get a RunData object passed at every refresh().

author: henning
msg: Add a new tool scope: authorized Tools

author: henning
msg: Clean up tool cycle into initTool and refreshTool
Remove some static variables which should be class variables
